content.content: Hello Everyone, The official thread for ERC-998. Please use the links below to discuss. There’s ample ways to get involved. Try to use the following ways to reach out and get involved: Discussion on the ERC is here: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/998 There is a sample implementation in the ERC link above, please fork, test and pull request if you have direct input. Join us on discord for dicussion on everything from nomenclature of the interface to use cases and dapps: https://discord.gg/3TtqP2C
content.GPT-summary: The post introduces ERC-998 Composable Non-Fungible Tokens (CNFTs) and provides links for discussion and involvement. The author explains the proposal and invites feedback, collaboration, and advertising. A 3rd party can give constructive criticism or extend to the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
